msg.msgText: The XA transaction branch can be committed by using the "imaserver commit" command. Use this command only when you are certain that the transaction cannot be resolved by the normal protocols. Issuing this command might result in the loss of transactional integrity between resource managers for a distributed transaction. SYNTAX: imaserver commit help imaserver commit Transaction "XID=value" EXAMPLE: imaserver commit Transaction "XID=57415344:0000014247FEBB3D000000012008CC78A1A981840C3350B9E23A3C2EFB8E5A6D864A89C0:00000001"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
